name: TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY : Prior to starting on site.

○ Survey conducted of all surfaces, footpaths, kerbs, driveways and the exterior of buldings on or adjacent to the boundaries of the site and of other property that might potentially be affected by the works.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Survey documents submitted to Engineer.
SPECIFICATION REFERENCE: FNDC Approved Materials List - Wastewater and Stormwater
TEST/TASK REQUIRED: Visual check for approved materials, quality and condition.
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY : On arrival to site, prior to using materials.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Materials meet specifications or otherwise approved by Engineer.
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY : Prior to commencing each stage of work.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Survey set out as per IFC drawings.
COMMENTS: Check all MHs for levels, prior to constructing drainage lines, they must verify the inverts and locations of existing manholes as part of the inspection and testing process
TEST/TASK REQUIRED: Locate underground services within work area.
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY : Locate, pothole and protect existing services. Pothole information shall be used to confirm fittings required to connect to the existing services.
TEST/TASK REQUIRED: AP20 Grading curve to be submitted to Engineer for approval.
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY : Prior to using bedding material on site.
○ PE bedding, pipe surround and haunching shall be AP20 in accordance with AS/NZS 2566.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Bedding grading curve accepted by Engineer.
TEST/TASK REQUIRED: Subbase material meets FNDC Engineering Standards
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY : Prior to using subbase material on site.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Subbase material test certificates accepted by Engineer.
TEST/TASK REQUIRED: Bascourse material meets FNDC Engineering Standards
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY : Prior to using basecourse material on site.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Basecourse material test certificates accepted by Engineer.
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY : Visual inspection prior to  use (clean and free from defects).
SPECIFICATION REFERENCE: Wastewater Specification B.7.8 and B.7.9
○ Pipeline installed to correct alignment, grade and level
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY : On completion of installation of each length of pipe, prior to backfilling.
○ Vertical tolerance +/- 10% of the design grade for each section of pipe.
SPECIFICATION REFERENCE: Wastewater Specification 'Package 3 - Bisset - Pipe Bridges Specification
○ Pipe installed as per specification to correct alignment, grade and level
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY : On completion of installation of each pipe bridge.
○ Vertical tolerance +/- 10% of the design grade for each section of pipe.
○ Manhole checks including position, haunching, steps and sealed joints.
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY : On completion of manhole installation.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Falls through manholes are to be within +5mm of design levels.
○ Maximum deviation from vertical (manholes/chambers) shall be 10mm per metre.
○ Compaction test on top of bedding.
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY : Bedding installed as per specifications.
○ Compaction test on top of GAP65.
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY : On completion of GAP65 layer.
SPECIFICATION REFERENCE: Wastewater Specification B.3.6 and B.3.7
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY : NDM testing on completion of subbase layer, prior to installing basecourse.
○ Backfill and compaction completed as per specifications.
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY : NDM testing on completion of basecourse layer, prior to sealing.
○ Basecourse installed as per FNDC Engineering Standards, and NZTA B/02.
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY : "Sewerage" detection tape laid directly above all wastewater pipelines.
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY : Each section of pipeline is to be tested by 'Air Test', including Lunden junctions.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Drop in pressure shall not exceed 25mm over a period of 5 minutes.
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY : Visual inspection of each manhole prior to backfilling.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Drop in level shall not exceed 5mm in 10 minutes.
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY : On completion of each connection.
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY : On completion of wastewater installation.
○ Driveways reinstated in the same material and to the same standard as existing prior to works.
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY : On completion of wastewater installation.
○ Footpaths reinstated in the same material and dimensions as existing footpath, and constructed to FNDC Standards.
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY : Kerb and channel profiles match existing.
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY : Prior to pouring concrete.
TEST/TASK REQUIRED: As per NZTA M10 Specification
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY : On completion of the pavement surface.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Test results submitted to Engineer.
TEST/TASK REQUIRED: As-built records and coordinate data
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY : Draft as-builts shall be complete and accepted by Engineer prior to Practical Completion.
○ Final as-builts issued prior to Final Completion.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: As-builts submitted to the Engineer for approval.
TEST/TASK REQUIRED: CCTV video survey to the National Standards
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY : On completion of the installation of each pipeline with backfill to the top of the pipe.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: CCTV results submitted to Engineer for approval.
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY : RAMM information submitted to the Engineer on completion of works.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: RAMM information submitted to the Engineer.
